summary: Missing Control Prompts for Movement and Interaction
description: When the player enters the game, no control prompts are displayed for movement, interaction, exiting UI screens, or general gameplay actions. The player must infer controls such as movement (WASD), interaction ([E]), and UI exit (Right Mouse Button) through trial and error. For first-time players, this significantly impacts onboarding and general usability of core systems.
steps: 3. Attempt to interact with objects such as the suit, ladder, or control panel.

expected: The game should provide control hints or onboarding prompts (e.g., "Press [E] to interact," "Press [RMB] to exit").
actual: No prompts are displayed, requiring players to guess the control scheme.
